entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Daniel's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:47 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 07:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -17.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -20.9°C
Wind: SE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
